summary: Email exchange between Geoffrey Berman and an unnamed recipient regarding the final proofreading and sending of Jeffrey Epstein's first indictment document on July 2, 2019, just prior to its presentation.

persons.name: Geoffrey Berman
persons.role: U.S. Attorney for the Southern District of New York
persons.context: Requests a copy of the indictment to be presented on July 2, 2019, and is the recipient of the attached indictment document.

events.title: Finalization and Presentation of Epstein Indictment
events.description: Email exchange shows the indictment against Jeffrey Epstein is being proofread and prepared for presentation on July 2, 2019.

keyFacts: The email is dated July 2, 2019, and discusses the imminent presentation of Jeffrey Epstein's first indictment.
An attached document named '2019-07-01,JE,first indictment.docx' is referenced, indicating the indictment was finalized around July 1, 2019.
Geoffrey Berman, the U.S. Attorney for the Southern District of New York, is directly involved in requesting and receiving the indictment.
The correspondence shows a final proofreading was being conducted just before the indictment's presentation.
